AhmedMedeniForAdvice: Ahmed Al Madani Advocates & Consultants Foundation
FirstDescription: Ahmed Al-Madani Advocates & Legal Consultants is one of the leading legal facilities in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia with an international reach and specializes in providing legal and advisory services according to the highest local and international standards, with our elite of internationally qualified lawyers and consultants with cumulative experiences of more than thirty years, which made us one of the most capable and efficient facilities to provide all legal services to our clients professionally in the most accurate disciplines and find innovative solutions to the legal challenges facing them locally and internationally.
SecondDescription: Where we have taken over many cases and provided many consultations and legal work in precise disciplines to address disputes that have cumulatively reached billions of riyals, in addition to that, we work with a global network of law firms and legal entities that have great experience in all disciplines to contribute with us in developing ideal solutions to disputes and challenges facing our clients at the international level, which makes us provide the best services and options in resolving their disputes and protecting their rights and interests at the local and international levels.
